Package com.islandpower.configurator.model.project

Class Appliance

java.lang.Object
com.islandpower.configurator.model.project.Appliance
public class Appliance extends Object
Model representing an appliance in a project. This class defines the attributes of an appliance, including its type, power consumption, usage details, and calculated energy requirements.
